reminders.title: Important
reminders.intro: Before dropping your keys, please make sure that:

reminders.otherkeys: You took back your other keys

keyDrop.title: Drop keys
keyDrop.papers:
Deposit of your registration certificate is required for insurance claims.
For other interventions it is not mandatory
keyDrop.confirmKey: I confirm that I dropped my keys
keyDrop.confirmPaper: I confirm that I dropped my registration certificate
keyDrop.restitutionWish: I want to pick up my key in the device
keyDrop.wait: Veuillez patienter jusqu'a l'ouverture de la trappe.

confirmation.title: Confirmation
confirmation.messageDetail:
Before we can start to work on your car, please send us the work order that you will receive by email.

This document will be sent to you as soon as we start working on your car.
confirmation.messagePickDetail: Toute l'équipe vous remercie de votre confiance et vous souhaite bonne route.
